title.rendered: OVC Active Noise Cancelling Earphones Headphones Wired Earbuds – 60 Hours ANC Playtime, Dual Driver, Bass Enhancement…

content.rendered:
Active Noise (*60*) and Dual Driver Active

Advanced energetic noise cancelling know-how reduces ambient noise as much as 30 db on common, performing even higher within the vary of 200Hz-8000Hz.

Noise (*60*) Speaker and Music Play Speaker separating design for much less ear stress impact.

60h Active Working Time

OVC H15 enhanced rechargeable battery efficiency. One full cost, for greater than 60h steady noise cancelling music enjoyment, 3 or 4 occasions longer than related ANC headphones. No fear about low energy when you find yourself outdoors.

Bass Enhanced and Convenient Control

Heavy bass, providing you with a singular listening expertise

Mic,up and down keys can simply change the amount, skip tracks, reply calls and activate voice management

Ear suggestions with in-ear lock degisn depart you no worries about earbuds sliding down.

Full Fabric Design Cord makes it lighter and extra sturdy than most ANC headphones and comfy

 Active Noise (*60*): OVC H15 ANC Earphones adopts superior energetic noise cancelling know-how and Dual Driver Active Design (6mm Dynamic Driver for Music Play, 13.6mm Dynamic Driver for Active Noise (*60*)) for Lower Ear Pressure Effect and Better Listening Experience. Average energetic noise lowered price as much as 30dB.
Unique Bass Enhancement& In-Ear Comfortable: For the music followers, bass enhancement is crucial. We made it in our OVC ANC Earphone. The ear suggestions made by delicate materials, lighter and extra sturdy than most ANC headphones. Less discomfort sporting OVC Active Noise (*60*) Earphone.
60h Active Working Time: Enhanced rechargeable battery efficiency. One full cost, for greater than 60h steady noise cancelling music enjoyment, 3 or 4 occasions longer than related ANC headphones. No fear about low energy when you find yourself outdoors.
Volume & Microphone Control: With constructed-in mic and distant, you may simply change quantity, skip tracks, take calls and provoke voice controls. Stable and Clip Design: We supply two sizes of ear suggestions, one medium measurement, one small measurement which completely suits for your ear.
